channel.title: [Class suggestion] The Lawbringer and The Deviant
channel.description:
So these roles were inspired by somebody on feedback. Bear in mind that the premise behind this was purely to make a conversion target that would be based on other peoples actions and predicting them. This role will be unique but convertible.
Lawbringer:
Faction: Blue dragon (Killing)
Passive (Reclusion) : If you should vote guilty on a blue dragon member during trial you will not be able to talk untill after the end of the following day.
Day Ability(1 every day) : Choose one player. Should they vote another player today it will unlock the use of your night abilities on that player
Night abilities:
1.Punish (Infinite): The player who voted will be unable to vote or use any day abilities they may have the next day
2.Remove: (Infinite): The player will be unable to participate in tommorow's conversation and will be limited to one vote which will be used should the player rescind not allowing them to vote again.
3.Banish(1): The player will die but be revived in three days time. Their role will be revealed for the duration.
And their Converted role: The Deviant
Passive: If you vote guilty on a blue dragon member you may choose one player and remove their tongue for a day making them unable to use vowels in their speech.
Day Ability: Choose one player. Should they vote a member of the unseen today this unlocks your night abilities for use on that player
Night abilities:
1. Plot (Infinite): Have a random player not of the unseen receive a message that the affected player visited the princess ,that they attempted to turn them into a knight or that their abilities have been replaced by fireworks.
2. Scheme (infinite): Every player except the target receives a letter of your writing.
3. Murder (2): Kill the player affected by the day ability
